post.text: The most fundamental duty of government is to protect American lives. The Obama-Clinton administration has failed to protect our people. As President, my number one priority will ALWAYS be to keep you and your families safe. Believe me, together, we WILL Make America SAFE Again! #ImWithYou

comment.author: Harleigh
comment.text: This is what gets me,Obama,Clinton wants to bring all these people. To the USA!! Their are no jobs now, And bring them in to do what. Take more jobs from the ones that live here. You have my VOTE!!!!!!!

replies.author: Melissa
replies.text: It's pretty sad if a Syrian refugee could take a job from an American. Must be a pretty lame American.

replies.author: John
replies.text: The refugees and illegal immigrants will take more than just our jobs..Democrat leaders will sink the United States into globalization our children and grandchildren will suffer dearly. Sorry!
